data.actual_result: The search icon and text overlaps with the textfield above
data.expected_result: The search icon/image for no result should be shown below the textfield
data.short_description: Search icon overlapping with search text field for server members when they are no results
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server settings -> members - Use the search there - Use any search keyword that results in a no results message - Make sure that your virtual keyboard is shown and you are using an iPad with landscape mode
